channel.title: Damnation:Revolution 718 (#1 Competitive server!)
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Damnation:Revolution[/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.Damnation.us]Website[/url] [url=http://www.damnationscape.forumotion.com]Forum[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Download[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Vote[/url][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Features[/size][/center]
[center][size=16pt]Dedicated, Friendly, and Mature Staff[/size][/center] [center]By this I mean we at Damnation don't claim to be a great staff, we show it. Unlike many other server owners, we take the time to listen to your feedback, and wont insult or shun you for bringing a bug or suggestion to our attention.[/center]
[center][size=16pt]Functional Grand Exchange[/size][/center][center]Grand exchange is waiting for you in NW Varrock, to buy and sell any items you desire! (Excluding Rares)[/center]
[center][size=16]Great Economy[/size][/center] [center]With prices set very carefully, monster drops set just right, and grand exchange there to pick up any slack, our economy is as stable as can be.[/center]
[center][size=16pt]99.9% Uptime[/size][/center] [center]A dedicated VPS host keeps us up at all times, the only downtime will come from updates.[/center]
[center][size=16pt]Many Bosses[/size][/center] [center]We have a wide range of bosses including, KBD, QBD, Nex, Corp, all GWD bosses, and more![/center]
[center][size=16pt]Minigames[/size][/center] [center]Our minigame line up includes, Castle wars, soul wars, pest control, barrows, fight caves (63 waves), fight kiln (37 waves), and more![/center]
[center][size=16pt]Squeal of Fortune[/size][/center] [center]SOF is here and filled with a large assortment of useful and cosmetic items![/center]
[center][size=16pt]Low Experience Rates[/size][/center] [center]WARNING IF YOU DON'T LIKE A CHALLENGE THIS MAY NOT BE THE SERVER FOR YOU!! Our experience rate is only about 3x rs experience rate. This allows our players to feel a sense of accomplishment for all of their skills, items, money, and most importantly their place in the high scores![/center]
[center]Grand Exchange [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855415/ge.png[/img]
Coin pouch [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855419/mp1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855421/mp2.png[/img]
Slayer! [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855425/slayer.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855427/green_drag.png[/img][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3855422/training.png[/img]
SOF!! [img]http://i1231.photobucket.com/albums/ee510/CallMeSandwich/Sof.png[/img] And much more! Will add more media soon!![/center]

item.title: Damnation:Revolution 718 (#1 Competitive server!)
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

It was a test. “By this I mean we at Damnation don’t claim to be a great staff, we show it.” You didn’t just say “This guy doesn’t know what he’s talking about” or whatever, you assured me otherwise. I’m interested.

Read full topic

item.title: Damnation:Revolution 718 (#1 Competitive server!)
item.dc:creator: @DamnationRevolution DamnationRevolution
item.description:
@DamnationRevolution wrote:

This was made rather quickly, I can assure you, there is more fixed on this server than any server out there, including… NPC stats, gfx, emotes, Every dungeon available, every agility shortcut usable, slayer completely redone to have every master, including kuradels dungeon. 100% working farming, hunter, agility, thieving, ect. The only skills not 100% accurate at this time are con, and dungeoneering, we are still working on making these 100% accurate.

Read full topic

item.title: Damnation:Revolution 718 (#1 Competitive server!)
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

Shows nothing unique. From what you have shown, looks 100% leeched.

Read full topic
